scripts.publish:do: npm run prerelease:do && npm publish --access public --tag alpha && npm dist-tag add @zuord/type@$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") latest
scripts.publish:util: cd util && npm run install:util && npm run publish:do
scripts.publish:api: cd api && npm run install:api && npm run publish:do
scripts.publish:repo: npm run publish:type && npm run publish:util && npm run publish:api
